content: ten sided throw rug a simple knits design this 10 sided rug is fast and easy to crochet using up odd balls of acrylic worsted weight yarn it is made with a big hook and two strands of yarn held together use a strand of two different colors and change colors when one runs out don t change both colors at the same time tie on a new ball and work over the ends to hide them a neutral and a darker or brighter color held together make a good contrast and give a heathered effect use any colors you like or choose colors that go together i sorted all my yarn into neutrals white cream beige gray and black and the rest by individual colors i started with one strand of neutral and one strand of color you could recycle old t-shirts or clothes cut into ½ wide strips to make this rug © 2003 vicki mikulak all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only questions simple knits@yahoo com revised 5/30/2013 materials crochet hook size n 9 mm for a larger rug worsted weight synthetic yarn work more repeats of round 4 until your rug is as 11 ounces made a rug 30 across large as desired size 30 across options gauge 2 sts = 1 & 2 row = 1 5 1 you can make the rug using only one strand of yarn with a size h 5 mm or i 5 5 mm hook key you must work extra rounds for the rug to be the chain -
